resources.string: Schedule is a type of scheduling in which the scheduler can schedule own plan. The goal of Scratch scheduling is to adapt to dynamically changing progress and form an optimal configuration in self-sustained manner.An example of a Grid schedule would be Monday from 8:30 AM to 10:00 AM ,Tuesday from 8:00 AM to 12:00 AM or Thursday - Sunday 3:00 PM to 11:00 PM.

Schedule is a timetable that generally consists of the same number of hours and days worked per week. Grid schedules tend to stay consistent once the number of hours and days have been agreed upon Scheduler. An example of a Grid schedule would be Monday - Friday from 8:30 AM to 5:00 PM or Thursday - Sunday 3:00 PM to 11:00 PM.
